The game is very fun, realistic, must be alert at all times.
Good Game, but too many hacker

I can agree that the game is overall good, but matchmaking, and especially the community being so unbelievably toxic, makes me not want to play this game at all. You'll run into teamkillers, cheaters, voice chat flamers, and pretty much every subcategory of toxicity under the sun. 

If you want to play this game, get a friend. If you don't have a friend, stay away. Workshop maps are great, but the bots aren't all too good, not as good as Source.

Каждый сирота  найдет своего батю, Я хуею миллионная компания которая не может нормально наладить свою торговую площадку и свою игру,а еще берет комиссию со своей игры и своей площадки.

Good game, playing it for 7 years

Cs:Go a fost printre cele mai bune jocuri tip shooting , dar acuma a devenit cel mai prost , o companie asa mare ca si Valve nu este in stare de 6 luni de zile sa rezolve o singura problema ,anti-cheat ul , dar a putut sa scoata corectiile de culare de la envidia , a putut sa bage o suta de status prime , dar este egal cu 0 , jocul este plin de hakeri , nu te poti juca linistit un meci de competitive fara sa dai de cel putin 3 hakeri ( tin sa mentionez ca am status prime si High Trust + Global Elite ) . Jocul asta a ajuns un HvH . Vac ul nu mai functioneaza de mai bine de jumate de an , Big dislike for Valve .
